content:
Hi everyone!

Please let me know if this is not the right place.

We have two vacancies in or research group for people interested in doing a PhD about WebAssembly and Confidential Computing.

  • Cloud based confidential computing with WebAssembly and AMD SEV-SNP: https://tiwi.ugent.be/assets/pdf/vacatures/PhD%20position_Cloud%20backend-based%20confidential%20computing.pdf
  • Edge based confidential computing for SOLID data storage: https://tiwi.ugent.be/assets/pdf/vacatures/PhD%20position-edge-based%20confidential%20computing.pdf

We do very practical-oriented research in collaboration with industry and open source partners.

We're looking for people who have a masters in computer science or equivalent, can show they're great programmers, and are good at writing about their work.

These are two well-paid positions in Ghent, Belgium. Base pay is calculated using this salary scale: https://www.ugent.be/en/work/talent/welcoming-new-staff/salaryscales/aapvwpeas3.htm We include relevant industry experience for your seniority scale. In addition to this, you get a bunch of benefits, holiday pay, 13th month etc. Don't forget to multiply everything by the current index (x2,0807 currently).

Please contact me if you have questions or want to know more.

Salary scale Assistant, post-doctoral assistant; VWP: e.a. assistant language lector
